mapper.select: SELECT prjname FROM PROJECTBASIC WHERE prjNo=#{prjNo}
select count(*) from MATERIALRESOURCE where 1=1 and materialresourcename LIKE '%'||#{materialresourcename}||'%' and prjNo=#{prjNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE MATERIALRESOURCE SET prjno=#{prjNo}, prjname=#{prjNo}, rentorbuy=#{rentorbuy}, price=#{price}, materialresourcename=#{materialresourcename}, productcnt=#{productcnt}, facilityloc=#{facilityloc}, division=#{division} WHERE materialresourceno=#{materialresourceno}

SELECT * FROM repository WHERE MATERIALRESOURCENAME LIKE '%'||#{materialresourcename}||'%' order by repno
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPOSITORY (repno,division,materialresourcename,repcnt,rentorbuy,facilityloc) SELECT flowbrick_repno.nextval, m.division, m.MATERIALRESOURCENAME, #{cntInput}, m.RENTORBUY, m.FACILITYLOC FROM MATERIALRESOURCE m WHERE MATERIALRESOURCENO=#{materialresourceno}

INSERT INTO MATERIALRESOURCE (materialresourceno,prjno,prjname,rentorbuy,price,materialresourcename,productcnt,facilityloc,division) SELECT flowbrick_materialresourceno.nextval, #{prjNo}, #{prjname}, r.rentorbuy, 0, r.materialresourcename, #{cntInputRepToMr}, r.facilityloc,r.division FROM REPOSITORY r WHERE repno=#{repno}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REPOSITORY r WHERE repcnt=0
mapper.select: SELECT p.prjno id, to_char(p.prjbegin,'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date,to_char(p.prjend,'YYYY-MM-DD') end_date, p.PRJNAME text , p.progress, p.parent, p.prjpriority priority, p.prjstep step FROM projectbasic p UNION all SELECT t.taskno id, to_char(t.taskbegin,'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date,to_char(t.taskend,'YYYY-MM-DD') end_date, t.taskNAME text , t.taskprogress, t.taskparent, t.taskpriority priority, t.taskstep step FROM task t ORDER BY id
select taskno FROM task WHERE taskparent = #{id}

INSERT INTO task values(#{id},#{text},#{priority},to_date(#{start_date},'MON DD YYYY','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN'),to_date(#{start_date},'MON DD YYYY','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN'),to_date(#{end_date},'MON DD YYYY','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN'),#{step},0,#{parent},0)

UPDATE PROJECTBASIC SET prjname = #{text}, prjpriority = #{priority}, PRJBEGIN = to_date(#{start_date},'MON DD YYYY','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN'), PRJEND =to_date(#{end_date},'MON DD YYYY','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN') , PRJSTEP =#{step} , progress=#{progress} , parent=#{parent}, sortorder=0 WHERE prjno=#{id}

UPDATE Task SET TASKNAME= #{text}, TASKPRIORITY= #{priority}, TASKBEGIN= to_date(#{start_date},'MON DD YYYY','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN'), TASKEND=to_date(#{end_date},'MON DD YYYY','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN') , TASKSTEP=#{step} , TASKPROGRESS=#{progress} , TASKPARENT=#{parent}, TASKSORTORDER=0 WHERE TASKNO =#{id}
